name: Falling Egg
description:
In this game press left or right the bucket and collect the egg. Collect as fast as you can, If you miss collecting the egg you lose (or not). There a 6 scene that you can play it (Morning 1, Morning 2, Day, Evening, Night and Midnight)

Controls: A key for Left / D key for Right, L key for back to Main Scene.

Music by freesound and Fantom.  Game Original by M2H
